title: The Flake Equation
transcript:
((Panel consists of a large equation with call-out text indicating what each variable indicates))
P = Wp x (Cr + Mi) x Tk x F0 + F1 x Dt X Au
alt: Statistics suggest that there should be tons of alien encounter stories, and in practice there are tons of alien encounter stories. This is known as Fermi's Lack-of-a-Paradox.
